= Sample Class =
{{{
public class Customer {
   private int _id;
   private string _firstName;
   private string _lastName;
   
   public int ID {
      get { return _id; }
      set { _id = value; }
   }

   public string FirstName {
      get { return _firstName; }
      set { _firstName = value; }
   }

   public string LastName {
      get { return _lastName; }
      set { _lastName = value; }
   }   
}
}}}

Get an instance of a serializer for this class.
{{{
   Customer cust = new Customer();
   cust.ID = 23;
   cust.FirstName = "Fred";
   cust.LastName = "Flintstone";
   Serializer serializer = Serializer.GetSerializer(typeof(Customer));
   string result = serializer.Serialize();
}}}

The output should look something like this:
{{{
{
   ID: 23,
   FirstName: "Fred",
   LastName: "Flintstone"
}
}}}
